channel.title: Making A Epic Server... One Problem
channel.description:
The teleports on the server are listen "varrock" "falador" "camelot" (teleports are in the magic tab, like real runescape) i wish to change these names to something like beginner training, skiller area and fishing...
Id also like to change the co ords they take you to.
Can anyone help? like what file i have to edit in the source would be helpfull ;)!

item.title: Making A Epic Server... One Problem

thats what i said leno o.O

item.description:
@leno33 wrote:

no…you search for the teleport coords (#### ####) in client.java and the teleport names in texthandler.java.

item.title: Making A Epic Server... One Problem
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

The teleports if found are in client.java (may not be though, sometimes theres a teleports folder) To change the Coords,

to change the name of them go to texthandler.java(i think java) and scroll down a bit and they should be there

Read full topic
